import React from 'react' import './Post.css'; import {formatISO9075} from 'date-fns'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export const Post = ({title,summary,cover,content,createdAt,author}) => { if (author) { console.log(author.username+'asdf'); } else { console.log('thor is undefined'); } return (

{title}

{summary}

{author ? author.username : 'Loading...'}
{formatISO9075(new Date(createdAt))}
) }
